public ref class MailDefinition sealed : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 允许控件用文本文件或字符串创建电子邮件。

span.span: Allows a control to create email messages from text files or strings.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可由控件用来 从文本文件或包含电子邮件正文的字符串创建对象。The class can be used by controls to create a object from a text file or a string that contains the body of the email message. 使用 类可简化创建由控件发送的预定义电子邮件。Use the class to simplify creating predefined email messages to be sent by a control. 如果希望不使用控件发送电子邮件，请参阅 类。If you want to send email not using a control, see the class. 可以通过将字符串传递给 方法 ，将字符串映射到替换项，从而在电子邮件正文中进行文本替换。You can make text substitutions in the body of the email message by passing to the method an instance that maps strings to their replacements. 使用类的方法发送类创建的对象 。The object created by the class is sent using the method of the class. 若要发送电子邮件，必须在 Web.config 文件中配置 SMTP 邮件服务器。To be able to send email, you must configure an SMTP mail server in your Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ < smtp > 元素 (网络设置) ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings)。For more information, see the [<smtp> Element (Network Settings)](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings). > [!NOTE] > 类不支持数据绑定。The class does not support data binding. 类的属性 不能使用 `<%# %>` 数据绑定表达式语法绑定到数据。Properties of the class cannot be bound to data using the `<%# %>` data-binding expression syntax. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从 Web 窗体页创建 Internet 电子邮件。The following code example creates an Internet email message from a Web Forms page. 您可以在窗体中输入消息的文本，或者输入要用作邮件正文的文本文件的名称。You can either enter the text of the message in the form or enter the name of a text file to use as the body of the mail. 此代码为消息定义了两个字符串替换：从窗体 "到" 文本框中的收件人列表将替换字符串 " \<%To%> "，并且在属性中指定的文本 将替换字符串 " \<%From%> "。The code defines two string replacements for the message: the recipient list from the form's To text box will replace the string "\<%To%>", and the text specified in the property will replace the string "\<%From%>". 在此代码生成的 Web 窗体页上，你可以单击 " **创建电子邮件"，只显示** 以创建电子邮件并在网页 中显示对象的属性。On the Web Forms page that this code generates, you can click **Create email and display only** to create an email message and display the properties of the object in the Web page. 单击 " **创建电子邮件" 并发送** ，同时在网页中显示电子邮件，并使用 Internet 电子邮件将邮件发送给收件人。Click **Create email and send** to both display the email message in the Web page and send the message to the recipients using Internet email. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控件具有接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This control has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置包含电子邮件正文文本的文件的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the file that contains text for the body of the email message.

value.span: 包含邮件正文文本的文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the file that contains the message body text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定要用于电子邮件正文的文本文件的位置。The property specifies the location of the text file to use for the body of the email message. 方法使用其 `owner` 参数将 属性映射到服务器上的路径。The method uses its `owner` parameter to map the property to a path on the server. 如果 `owner` 参数指向 .aspx 页上的控件或指向该页本身，则该 属性指向 .aspx 页所在的同一目录中的文本文件。If the `owner` parameter points to a control on an .aspx page or to the page itself, the property points to a text file in the same directory as the .aspx page. 例如，如果 .aspx 页面位于 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx，则该 控件将在目录 c:\inetpub\wwwroot。中查找文本文件。For example, if the .aspx page is located at C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx, the control looks for the text file in the directory C:\inetpub\wwwroot. 如果在 .ascx 文件中包含的用户控件中使用类，则该属性将 指向用户控件所在的同一目录中的文本文件。If the class is used in a user control contained in an .ascx file, the property points to a text file located in the same directory as the user control. 例如，如果 .aspx 页面位于 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx 上并且用户控件位于 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls\control.aspx，则 对象将在目录中查找文本文件 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls。For example, if the .aspx page is located at C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx and the user control is at C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls\control.aspx, the object looks for the text file in the directory C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为在 Web 窗体页上的控件中输入的文本。The following code example sets the property to the text entered in a control on a Web Forms page. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#3)]

member this.CC : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置将邮件的抄送件 (CC) 发送到的电子邮件地址的逗号分隔列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of email addresses to send a copy (CC) of the message to.

value.span: 用逗号分隔的电子邮件地址列表，将邮件 (CC) 发送到。

span.span: A comma-separated list of email addresses to send a copy (CC) of the message to.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含电子邮件的其他收件人列表。The property contains a list of additional recipients of the email message. 如果该 属性包含格式不正确的电子邮件地址，则该 方法将引发 异常，并且不会发送电子邮件。If the property contains an improperly formed email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为在 Web 窗体页上的控件中输入的文本。The following code example sets the property to the text entered in a control on a Web Forms page. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 创建通过 SMTP（简单邮件传输协议）发送的电子邮件。

span.span: Creates an email message to send by means of SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.Mail.MailMessage CreateMailMessage (string recipients, System.Collections.IDictionary replacements, System.Web.UI.Control owner);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.Mail.MailMessage CreateMailMessage(string recipients, class System.Collections.IDictionary replacements, class System.Web.UI.Control owner) cil managed
Public Function CreateMailMessage (recipients As String, replacements As IDictionary, owner As Control) As MailMessage
public: System::Net::Mail::MailMessage ^ CreateMailMessage(System::String ^ recipients, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ replacements, System::Web::UI::Control ^ owner);
member this.CreateMailMessage : string * System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Web.UI.Control -> System.Net.Mail.MailMessage

param.name: recipients
param.span: 用逗号分隔的邮件收件人列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of message recipients.

param.span: ，包含字符串及其替换字符串的列表。

summary.span: 用文本文件创建通过 SMTP（简单邮件传输协议）发送的电子邮件。

span.span: Creates an email message from a text file to send by means of SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).

returns.span: 来自一个文本文件的电子邮件。

span.span: The email message from a text file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个新 的对象，该对象可以使用 方法发送。The method creates a new object that can be sent using the method. 属性必须设置为指示是否应将邮件格式设置为纯文本 () 或 HTML () 。The property must be set to indicate whether the mail message should be formatted as plain text () or HTML (). `recipients`参数包含以逗号分隔的电子邮件收件人列表。The `recipients` parameter contains a comma-separated list of recipients of the email message. 如果 `recipients` 参数包含格式不正确的 Internet 电子邮件地址，则该 方法将引发 异常，并且不会发送电子邮件。If the `recipients` parameter contains an improperly formatted Internet email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. `replacements`参数是一个 实例，其中包含要替换的字符串的列表。The `replacements` parameter is an instance that contains a list of strings to substitute. 字符串将按它们添加到集合中的顺序进行替换 ，并且它们可以覆盖先前的替换项。Strings are replaced in the order in which they were added to the collection, and they can overwrite earlier replacements. `owner`参数指示哪个控件是控件的父级 。The `owner` parameter indicates which control is the parent of the control. 它确定要在哪个目录中搜索在属性中指定的文本文件 。It determines which directory to search for the text file specified in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，该对象定义电子邮件中替换的两个字符串 ( " \<%To%> " 和 " \<%From%> " ) 。The following code example creates a object that defines two strings ("\<%To%>" and "\<%From%>") that are replaced in the email message. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#7)] 下面的代码示例使用 方法从文本文件创建新的电子邮件。The following code example uses the method to create a new email message from a text file. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#8)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#8)]

summary.span: 用文本文件创建通过 SMTP（简单邮件传输协议）发送的带有替换内容的电子邮件。

span.span: Creates an email message with replacements from a text file to send by means of SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).

returns.span: 来自一个文本文件的带有替换内容的电子邮件。

span.span: The email message with replacements from a text file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个新 的对象，该对象可与方法一起发送 。The method creates a new object that can be sent with the method. `recipients`参数包含以逗号分隔的电子邮件收件人列表。The `recipients` parameter contains a comma-separated list of recipients of the email message. 如果 `recipients` 参数包含格式不正确的 Internet 电子邮件地址，则该 方法将引发 异常，并且不会发送电子邮件。If the `recipients` parameter contains an improperly formatted Internet email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. `replacements`参数是一个 实例，其中包含要替换的字符串的列表。The `replacements` parameter is an instance that contains a list of strings to substitute. 字符串将按它们添加到集合中的顺序进行替换 ，并且它们可以覆盖先前的替换项。Strings are replaced in the order in which they were added to the collection, and they can overwrite earlier replacements. `body`参数包含电子邮件的文本。The `body` parameter contains the text of the email message. `owner`参数指示哪个控件是控件的父级 。The `owner` parameter indicates which control is the parent of the control. 它确定要在哪个目录中搜索在属性中指定的文本文件 。It determines which directory to search for the text file specified in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，该对象定义电子邮件中替换的两个字符串 ( " \<%To%> " 和 " \<%From%> " ) 。The following code example creates a object that defines two strings ("\<%To%>" and "\<%From%>") that are replaced in the email message. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#7)] 下面的代码示例使用 方法通过在 Web 窗体页上的控件中输入的文本来创建新的电子邮件。The following code example uses the method to create a new email message from text entered in a control on a Web Forms page. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取 实例的集合，这些实例通常用于在将电子邮件发送给用户前，将图像嵌入到 对象中。

span.span: Gets a collection of instances, typically used to embed images in a object before sending an email to a user.

value.span: 一个 实例，用于在将 电子邮件发送给用户前，将图像嵌入到对象中。

span.span: An instances used to embed images in a object before sending an email to a user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由属性返回的集合中的项 表示要嵌入电子邮件的项。The items in the collection returned by the property represent items to embed in an email message. 这些项可以包含图像文件，如公司徽标或其他图形。These items can include image files such as company logos or other graphics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含电子邮件发件人的电子邮件地址。The property contains the email address of the sender of the email message. 如果该 属性保留为空，或包含格式不正确的电子邮件地址，则该 方法将引发 异常，并且不会发送电子邮件。If the property is left blank, or contains an improperly formed email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为在 Web 窗体页上的控件中输入的文本。The following code example sets the property to the text entered in a control on a Web Forms page. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. abstract member System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState : unit -> obj override this.System.Web.UI.IStateManager.SaveViewState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 保存将页面回发到服务器之后发生的所有服务器控件视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves any server control view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 服务器控件的当前视图状态。

span.span: The server control's current view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() cil managed
abstract member System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState : unit -> unit override this.System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState : unit -> unit

summary.span: 导致跟踪服务器控件的视图状态的更改，以便这些更改可以存储到服务器控件的 对象中。

span.span: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
